DOC.detailed_description: Persistent post-herniotomy pain ( PPP ) affect everyday activity 5-10 % patient . Even brief interval acute pain induce long-term neuronal remodel sensitization , chronic pain lasting psychological distress . Chronic pain may cause intense acute PPP , intraoperative nerve injury and/or ongoing inflammation mesh response subsequence damage nerve structure . The aim study analyze analgesic efficacy , safety prevention persistent postsurgical pain two different pharmacological strategy .
